item.description: There is a small fee ($3) for playing. Just go on the courts and a Yale attendant will come to collect the fee.  Weather-related cancellations will be announced on this page by 10 AM on Saturday.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be playing at the Yale Outdoor Tennis Facility located at the corner of Yale Avenue and Derby Avenue (route 34). Parking is available on Derby Avenue at the stone pillars. Please call 203-913-1787 if you have trouble finding us. Josh

group.name: Tennis Meetup of New Haven and Fairfield Counties

item.name: Saturday Afternoon Tennis
